Applicant Name: West Morgan/East Lawrence Water andSewer Authority
Project Name: JD Sims-RM Hames Reverse Osmosis WaterTreatment Facility
Project Description:
West Morgan-East Lawrence Water & Sewer Authority proposes to add the remaining Reverses Osmosis
skids and other requirements associated with the completion of the installation of the reverse osmosis
system. This system is designed to remove PFAS from drinking water and ensure that the system meets
the expected future PFAS maximum contamination limits (MCL).
